creditline: Gift of Dr. Donald and Alice Lappé
description: statue of standing man at R, with PL hand on shoulder of a crouching man at L, seen from back; surrounded by wrought iron fence and flanked by 2 trees
image_copyright: Copyright of the artist%2C artist%27s estate%2C or assignees
markings: \'THE INJURED FOOTBALL PLAYER Sigismund Blumann/F.R.P.S.\', in pencil, on mount below image; \'The Injured Football Player./ Statue on the Campus/University of California/Berkeley, California\', in pencil, at center of sheet covering image; photographer\'s sticker, on back of mount; \'M051\', in pencil, at UL corner on back at top of cover sheet
title: The Injured Football Player, University of California, Berkeley
